Name: Formless
Description: An ephemeral realm with pieces from every Realm.

Name: Normal
Description: The normal realm of Chess.

Name: Hilly
Description: A realm of high hills with many leaping pieces.

Name: Sacred
Description: A high up realm with many diagonal moving pieces.

Name: Rocky
Description: A quarry realm with many orthogonal moving pieces.

Name: Wild
Description: A forested realm with pieces with orthogonal and diagonal moves.

Name: Ultimate
Description: A vibrant land with very powerful pieces.

Name: Divine
Description: The realm of the Gods.

Name: Armored
Description: A realm with pieces with different kinds of Invincibility.

Name: Explosive
Description: A realm with pieces that can explode to destroy multiple pieces.

Name: Relay
Description: A realm with pieces that can give other pieces their movement powers.

Name: Rush
Description: A realm of pieces strong at long range, but weak at short range.

Name: Ocean
Description: A realm of pieces that can cross the vertical sides of the board.

Name: Push
Description: A realm of pieces that can push allies in front of them.

Name: Sticky
Description: A realm of pieces that can pull allies behind them.

Name: Fire
Description: A realm of pieces with ranged attacking abilities.

Name: Enchanter
Description: A realm of enchanters with different kinds of aura abilities.

Name: Sinful
Description: A realm of demons that often have abilities that debilitate enemies.

Name: Virtuous
Description: A realm of angelic pieces that often have abilities helping allies.

Name: Arcane
Description: A realm of pieces with many kinds of magical abilities.

Name: Arcane
Description: A realm of elemental pieces.

Name: Celestial
Description: A realm of celestial objects. Many of them have orbital movement or other elemental abilities.

Name: Stellar
Description: A realm of zodiac creatures with many magical abilities.

Name: Elemental
Description: A realm of many kinds of Elementals with a variety of magical abilities.

Name: Avian
Description: A realm of birds that can fly cross many obstacles on the board.

Name: Switch
Description: A realm of pieces that switch moves depending on the color of square they're on.

Name: Battle
Description: A realm of pieces that gain power next to enemies.

Name: Hopper
Description: A realm of pieces with different kinds of leaping capture.

Name: Undead
Description: A realm of undead creatures that gain power through the death of other pieces.

Name: Monster
Description: A realm of monsters that debilitate enemies.

Name: Cursed
Description: A realm of cursed beings that turn others into them.

Name: Rabbit
Description: A realm of Rabbits that can turn others into them or have abilities boosted by ally Rabbits.

Name: Giant
Description: A realm of Elephants that take up multiple squares.

Name: Dark
Description: A realm of sneaky pieces with different ways of slipping into enemy territory.

Name: Gilded
Description: A realm of pieces with different kinds of King support.

Name: Mirror
Description: A realm of pieces with mirror or reflection movement.

Name: Electro
Description: A realm of pieces with different kinds of indirect capture.

Name: Forge
Description: A realm of pieces that can imbue modifiers onto other allies.

Name: Crooked
Description: A realm of pieces with zigzag movement.

Name: Clockwork
Description: A realm of pieces that change when moved or have automatic movement.

Name: Verdant
Description: A realm of pieces that can move underground to squares next to allies.

Name: Statue
Description: A realm of pieces that have more capturing movement than passive movement.

Name: Cliff
Description: A realm of pieces restricted to sections of the board.

Name: Split
Description: A realm of pieces that split into multiple pieces.

Name: Flank
Description: A realm of pieces that capture by moving besides their enemies.

Name: Frontward
Description: A realm of pieces that are biased towards forward movement.

Name: Two Sided
Description: A realm of pieces with different front and back movement.

Name: Narrow
Description: A realm of pieces with vertical biased movement.

Name: Flat
Description: A realm of pieces with horizontal biased movement.

Name: Glass
Description: A realm of fragile pieces that break when capturing.

Name: Quick
Description: A realm of pieces that all give bonus moves.

Name: Slow
Description: A realm of pieces that are powerful but can't be moved all the time.

Name: Soul Mage
Description: A realm of mages that sacrifice others to use their abilities.

Name: Charge
Description: A realm of pieces that build up charges to move further or use abilities.

Name: Ghoulish
Description: A realm of strong pieces but with heavy compulsions.

Name: Lawless
Description: A realm of pieces with dubious loyalty but strong abilities.

Name: Carnival
Description: A realm of pieces without capturing power, but can mess with enemies in other ways.

Name: Warped
Description: A realm of pieces with different kinds of teleportation powers.

Name: Icy
Description: A realm of pieces that can inflict Frozen.

Name: Toxic
Description: A realm of pieces that can inflict Poisoned.

Name: Evoker
Description: A realm of pieces that inflict status effects on their enemies.

Name: Skip
Description: A realm of pieces that skip over range 1 movement.

Name: Seasonal
Description: A realm of pieces that change over time.

Name: Diurnal
Description: A realm of pieces that change every turn.

Name: Honey
Description: A realm of pieces that can move each other or enemies along with them.

Name: Focus
Description: A realm of pieces that focus on particular squares before acting.

Name: Roller
Description: A realm of pieces with momentum.

Name: Glider
Description: A realm of rodents and sugar gliders, with a lot of leaping movement and movement to open areas.

Name: Amoeba
Description: A realm of amoebas, that can split and recombine with each other.

Name: Beastial
Description: A realm of powerful elemental beasts whose eggs hatch under special conditions.

Name: Lost
Description: A realm forgotten by the Gods. Pieces here are powerful but move along unusual paths.
